txt.en: The ukhrash matron has been defeated!
Defeat the ukhrash matron that has appeared.
Prince Ingór has declared that the Hall of Vérnozal needs to be further decorated to suit the needs of the Zhélruka clan.
'Good work obtaining those crystals! Those menacing ukhrâsh were no match for you! Prince Ingór will be pleased with your efforts! Come let us return to the Hall of Vérnozal with crystals in hand.'
'A furious ukhrash matron has burrowed into the deepest reaches of the caves!'
